name: Sel
appearance: Tall and spare with a salt-gray beard, brass-limned goggles always around his neck, and a tide-stained engineer’s coat stitched with ring-maps.
character: Deliberate, paternal, and iron-willed; keeps his voice even while the city panics.
talents: reading river color at a glance
dreams: annex Dry Dock Three by emergency decree to end sabotage
codify ring-rights into a single safety code
retire the bypass tunnel beneath the Gate Crown ethically
secrets: authorized a controlled ‘test flood’ during a night tide to sway a Parliament vote
keeps a private copy of the bypass tunnel map stolen from Mnemos archives
has used the starshard-toothed cog once and fears calling it again
